content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: RequestCertificate path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/waf/v1/stacks/{stack_id}/sites/{site_id}/delivery/certificates/request content: params
name stackid
desc a stack id or slug
in path
required true
schema
type str
name siteid
desc a site id
in path
required true
schema
type str
sum request a free certificate
reqbody
wafrequestcertificaterequest
type obj
props
hosts
type str
desc an optional list of delivery domains that will be included as subject alternative names on the certificate

if no hosts are provided all delivery domains on the site will be included with the first one in the list being used as the common name  if hosts are provided the first entry will be used as the common name
if the first host in the list is over 63 characters the shortest host provided will be used as the common name

all entries in the list are validated against the existing delivery domains for the provided site
wafcertificateverificationmethod
type str
default dns
desc the certificate verification method

verification method used to validate a requested certificate on a site

  dns verify a certificate using dns records
  http verify a certificate by using http validation this will require that all hosts on the certificate point to the site hash or ip
required true
responses
200
wafrequestcertificateresponse
type obj
props
schemawafcertificate
type obj
props
id
type str
desc a certificates unique id
fingerprint
type str
desc a unique hash of a certificates contents
commonname
type str
desc a certificates common name or the primary domain name the certificate is used for
issuer
type str
desc the name of the certificates issuing certificate authority
cabundle
type str
desc a pem pkcs #7 formatted certificate authority bundle
trusted
type bool
format bool
desc whether or not the certificates authority is trusted by a web browser
expirationdate
type str
format datetime
desc the date an ssl certificate will expire
createdate
type str
format datetime
desc the date an ssl certificate was created
updatedate
type str
format datetime
desc the date an ssl certificate was last updated
subjectalternativenames
type str
desc a list of subject alternative names in the certificate

certificates for multiple domains define their domains in certificates san list
schemawafcertificatestatus
type str
default unknown
desc a stackpathprovided certificates status

 unknown stackpath is unable to determine the certificates status this is the default status for enduser provided certificates
  pending the certificate is provisioning
  expired the certificate has expired
  failed the certificate failed to provision
  pendingverification the certificate is pending domain verification by the end user
  active the certificate is valid and is in use by one or more hosts
  inactive the certificate is valid but is not in use by any hosts
providermanaged
type bool
format bool
desc whether a certificate is managed by stackpath or the end user
certificatecertificatestatusdetails
type obj
verificationfailures
type arr
certificatecertificateverificationfailure
type obj
props
domain
type str
desc the host the verification failed on
details
type str
desc detailed information about the failure
checkedat
type str
format datetime
desc the last time the failure was detected
desc a record that indicates why a domain is failing ssl validation
desc failures preventing the certificate from being issued
desc detailed certificate status
desc an ssl certificate
verificationrequirements
type arr
wafverificationrequirements
type obj
props
wafdnsverificationdetails
type obj
props
dnsrecords
type str
desc a list of dns records that will validate domain ownership
records
type arr
wafdnsrecord
type obj
props
name
type str
desc the name of the network node to which a zone resource record pertains

use the value  to denote current root domain name
type
type str
desc a zone records type

zone record types describe the zone records behavior for instance a zone records type can say that the record is a name to ip address value a name alias or which mail exchanger is responsible for the domain see https//supportstackpathcom/hc/enus/articles/360001085563whatdnsrecordtypesdoesstackpathsupport for more information
class
type str
desc a zone records class code

this is typically in for internet related resource records
ttl
type integer
format int32
desc a zone records time to live

a records ttl is the number of seconds that the record should be cached by dns resolvers use lower ttl values if you expect zone records to change often use higher ttl values for records that wont change to prevent extra dns lookups by clients
data
type str
desc a zone records value

expected data formats can vary depending on the zone records type
desc a dns record

a dns record describes an individual piece of dns functionality in a dns zone
desc a list of parsed dns records required for ssl verification
desc dnsbased domain ownership verification details
wafhttpverificationdetails
type obj
props
path
type str
desc path to the verification file
contenttype
type str
desc response content type
body
type str
desc body content of response
desc httpbased domain ownership verification details
wafcertificateverificationmethod
type str
default dns
desc the certificate verification method

verification method used to validate a requested certificate on a site

  dns verify a certificate using dns records
  http verify a certificate by using http validation this will require that all hosts on the certificate point to the site hash or ip
desc conditions that must be met to verify ownership of a domain for ssl certificate provisioning
desc the certificates verification requirements
desc a response from a request to provision an ssl certificate for a waf site
title: 23_SSL_RequestCertificate_143.json
